documents.document: @threeredkings @BHHooker The 2013 series was poor to watch.
@BHHooker @threeredkings If you save the pennies to go to NZ/Oz/SA I'm sure the tour itself is mad craic for fans.
@BHHooker @threeredkings It's difficult for it to have a place in the pro era but everyone makes money from it.
@Overthehillprop @threeredkings I can't see Munster keeping him now. Maybe Ulster?
@threeredkings Still young too so hasn't reached his ceiling. His move to France worked out brilliantly.
@WrestlingSoup SK downloads of retro episodes not working for me?
@OvalDigest It's terrible. I was planning on going to both. Now it's Limerick only.
@Cianaf Any Conor McFootball parody accounts appear yet? :D
@Office_Zombie Their players will be wrecked.
You can't expect 5 consecutive weeks of play. In the RWC teams are rotated in the pool stages. Bye weeks in 6N areâ€¦ https://t.co/YLNtlNRz9U
@threeredkings @lemonsrbitter In 2012/2013 Treviso finished only 4 points behind Munster in the league. Pity indeed.
@threeredkings @lemonsrbitter And at some stage you have to prioritise the integrity/competitiveness of the competition.
May not agree on project players but how about this? @threeredkings @lemonsrbitter https://t.co/JjvTv1A0kZ
If I'm a Treviso or Zebre fan I'd rather go to Challenge Cup games that are competitive than watch my team get regularly routed.
The growing the game argument (which has merit) falls flat when the Six Nations is a closed shop.
1 win in the last 30 for Treviso and Zebre combined in the top tier in Europe. At some stage you have to make a change.
@Glinner People love to be 'outraged'.
@simonrug @WalesRugby I think it's fair. I think teams with an away QF and SF are on a hiding to nothing. Though understand frustration.
@simonrug @WalesRugby I don't see the issue. It lessens the effect of a lop sided pool.
Option to buy through associate membership. Nice one @MRSC16 .
@hughcahill7 It's to keep players from moving abroad. This isn't a surprise.
@Cianaf Still better than the former referee who never called any review correctly.
@threeredkings And my problem has nothing to do with players who have to maximise their income from a potentially short career.
@threeredkings Yes they are. The project player quota is basically that
@threeredkings That's fine. Just don't have the union buy them in to play international.
@threeredkings ...and not compete with them for spots with Ireland.
@threeredkings I think foreign players here should help to bring through Irish players to international level.
@threeredkings So I'd like to see the increase to 5 years happen. Focus the minds on developing indigenous players.
@threeredkings I hate unions buying in players to play for Ireland. I have nothing against the players who want to maximise income.
@threeredkings Where do you stand on residency players? Love for Stander aside.
@JustinDeeganEsq @EmeraldRugby The long term goal should be promotion-relegation with ENC. The 6N is great but it's a closed shop.
@MEGhAnnMix @threeredkings Sounds interesting, will give it a listen.
@rugby_ie Ye couldn't get a more recent photo? :D
@PFF_Sam @Cianaf Yeah exactly.
@threeredkings @shelflife68 @salmsonconnacht I'd wait for the result of the EPCR investigation before discussing this to be honest.
In the NFL Skip B*****s makes the troll rugby pundits look tame.
@PFF_Sam @Cianaf If Jets draft an early round QB is it an admission by FO that Hackenberg last year was a mistake?
@NoelRock Get this done Noel. We don't want a situation akin to the US where tickets are bought and sold like commodities.
@MallowNews @threeredkings Forget that Trumpt is an arse. They want to "bring down" someone who was democratically elected. Moronic.
@simonrug Positivity. I like it. Now if Welsh teams can benefit from being in the Challenge Cup, both Italian teams can too...
It's great to see SOLD-OUT tweets from Munster again.
Second man in is just ridiculous there. https://t.co/u6DCiYxzWf
@MurphyPaul10 Brilliant. Up there with Packers @ Cardinals last year.
If Cowboys didn't spike the ball on 1st down....fantastic game! #DALvsGB
What a game this is. Fantastic. #DALvsGB
@WSPSMSB_Screenr @JoeNumbas If JJ Watt can come back that D is going to be ridiculous.
@bencoles_ NFC South is not short of great QBs.
@bencoles_ He's fantastic. However he goes up against my team (Bears) every year...
@bencoles_ He's been astounding since promising to "run the table" in mid-season.
@JoeNumbas Belichick and Patricia planning to call plays against this Aaron Rodgers would be fascinating.
@Siffror @brianmoore666 I'm told the defense adjusts depending on who is in the huddle. Stops teams playing silly buggers I suppose.
@OvertimeIreland What's the idea of it? To allow the defence time to scan who will be involved in the play?
@JoeNumbas I feel bad for the Texans D. They're elite and let down by the offense. If Texans had a Big Ben / Rodgers / Brees they'd be A1.
@JoeNumbas Brock Osweiler is the greatest paid job guy ever
Good to see Murray HIA etc being looked into. Inevitable and correct following the North incident.
@iamjondraper Thanks that narrows it down! All the best for 2017.
@iamjondraper Hey Jon, when did you make your Soup debut? I'm searching the archives.
Falcons on fire.

@ImKateMc @paddylogan13 The Italians have no incentive to be better. Shouldn't be given free pass only to get hammered in every game.
@PFF_Sam @Cianaf Cheers Sam. If Bears can find a solution at QB then there's grounds for optimism. I have faith in GM Ryan Pace!
@Cianaf @PFF_Sam Just curious how Bears 2016 draft class graded vs other teams? Jordan Howard stands out of course

It's refreshing that the different NFL broadcasters have no problem advertising each other's coverage of different games.
Some night I will dream of Aaron Rodgers at 10 for Munster.

Aaron Rodgers is special. WHAT a play.

@phog6189 I'll give him a pass given injury. I predict he'll be starting by April.
@phog6189 I think Saili will end up being the better player by the end of the season.
@Cianaf Cleveland sign Osweiler to a 10 year 250m fully guaranteed contract.
@phog6189 On an unrelated point, I think Saili will be re-signed over Taute.
@phog6189 What would have happened if Sweetnam was fit? We'll never know. Assume Keet starts next week.
@phog6189 Being managed would make more sense if he didn't start the training session vs Racing U20s in two weeks.
Keith Earls looked for a lot of work when he came on. I wonder why he didn't start?
A win in Glasgow would be huge. The Racing squad was decent on paper but whatever reason they haven't turned up in Europe.
